1147,110|1144,110|1124,126|1084,126|1064,125|996,125|956,129|738,136|497,124|424,124|404,123|398,119|376,118|348,120|344,123|312,123|121,138|84,178|84,214|93,214|104,209|204,209|224,210|244,210|264,217|284,217|304,210|324,210|344,211|464,211|484,212|504,219|524,217|544,212|584,212|604,213|724,213|744,214|844,214|864,215|984,215|1004,216|1104,216|1124,217|1244,217|1264,218|1364,218|1384,219|1504,219|1524,220|1624,220|1644,221|1764,221|1784,222|1884,222|1904,223|1944,223|1947,226|1964,226|1985,192|1856,146|1492,138|1344,126|1184,126|1166,112|1147,110 300-01|300.|Letters,|Orders|and|Instructions.|December|1755.
